name: Inspired (Swagdaddy31)
description:
This game contains foul language and childish humor.

A short and sweet RPG, with one goal: save the neighbor's sick puppy. 

You will be exploring a forest, searching for a flower to make a medicine to cure her puppy's illness. Follow your heart!

There are a few assets that aren't used for anything. The old man by the lake is just dialogue. The spider silk isn't currently used for anything. There is a teleporter that is inactive. The gravestone is just flavor text. I may eventually add more to this project, but as of right now, I have lost my inspiration. 

I titled this game "Inspired" because a friend of mine started making a game of his own in RPGMaker XP, and it inspired me to mess around with RPGMaker MV. I will link to it when he uploads it!

Features 6 different enemies with unique movesets, 15 different screens (some are lackluster), spells, items, and (I believe) balanced short-term progression!

I recommend using the arrow keys and enter keys to navigate throughout the game, rather than using the mouse.

I'm open to any and all feedback! Just keep in mind it's my first time, so please be gentle.
